---
title: "gs_full.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file defines configuration settings for Google Cloud Storage within a larger storage configuration. It specifies the storage type as "object" and further details the object storage type as "googlecloud" with specific settings for bucket, prefix, and poll interval.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The root configuration block for storage settings.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the storage type as "object" and contains nested configuration for object storage.

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage being configured.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | Set to "object" to indicate object storage configuration |

### `storage.object`
#### Description
Contains configuration specific to object storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines the object storage type as "googlecloud" and includes nested configuration for Google Cloud Storage.

### `storage.object.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of object storage being used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | Set to "googlecloud" to indicate Google Cloud Storage configuration |

### `storage.object.googlecloud`
#### Description
Contains specific configuration settings for Google Cloud Storage.

#### Internal Logic
Defines three key settings for Google Cloud Storage: bucket, prefix, and poll_interval.

### `storage.object.googlecloud.bucket`
#### Description
Specifies the name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| bucket | string | Set to "testdata", indicating the name of the GCS bucket |

### `storage.object.googlecloud.prefix`
#### Description
Defines a prefix to be used for objects within the specified bucket.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| prefix | string | Set to "prefix", indicating a prefix for objects in the bucket |

### `storage.object.googlecloud.poll_interval`
#### Description
Specifies the interval at which to poll for changes in the Google Cloud Storage bucket.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| poll_interval | string | Set to "5m", indicating a 5-minute polling interval |

## Configuration
This YAML file defines the following configuration options:

| Option | Type | Value | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | "object" | Specifies object storage |
| storage.object.type | string | "googlecloud" | Specifies Google Cloud Storage |
| storage.object.googlecloud.bucket | string | "testdata" | Name of the GCS bucket |
| storage.object.googlecloud.prefix | string | "prefix" | Prefix for objects in the bucket |
| storage.object.googlecloud.poll_interval | string | "5m" | Interval for polling changes (5 minutes) |

This configuration file is likely used to set up and connect to a Google Cloud Storage bucket for data storage or retrieval purposes within a larger application or system. The poll interval suggests that the system may periodically check for updates or changes in the specified bucket.
